meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6806.

div.div: Battle of the Decades: The 2000s game 1.

td.p: Tom Nissley, a writer from Seattle, Washington
Celeste DiNucci, a manager of corporate and foundation relations at a music school from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Colby Burnett, an AP world history teacher from Chicago, Illinois

tr.td: ACCESSORIES
NBA FINALS MVPs
RETRONYMS
A LITERARY "B"
A SPACE ODDITY

(Alex: Lenses? Oh, give me a little more information.)
(Celeste: What are, uh... [time\'s-up signal sounds])
(Tom: What are glasses?)
(Alex: Be more specific. I need more information.)
(Tom: Uh... What are--[time\'s-up signal sounds])
(Alex: No, you\'re taking too much time. They were making [*].)

sunglasses

CelesteTom
Triple Stumper
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
